results.headline: Wind Across the Everglades
results.summary_short: Odd, aimless blend of baloney and solid stuff, namely Burl, the birds and the swamp.

results.headline: Dunkirk
results.summary_short: Realistic depiction of 1940 Allies' evacuation. More effective in its documentary footage.

results.headline: Badlanders, The
results.summary_short: One ex-con trying to go straight, the other out for revenge. Lively.

results.headline: Lucky Jim
results.summary_short: Not one of those subtle English comedy joys. This university jape lays it on with an anvil.

results.headline: Fly, The
results.summary_short: Ugly teleportation mishap. Original, chilling horror with memorable ending.

results.headline: Naked Earth
results.summary_short: Fallen gal reforms in Africa. Workmanlike Greco, background, atmosphere keep it interesting.

results.headline: Me and the Colonel
results.summary_short: Tasteful, diverting comedy of gentle Jew, nicely done by Kaye, and Polish officer fleeing Nazis. The catch is broad, ponderous Jurgens.

results.summary_short: Jet fighters. Fine aloft but grounded.

results.summary_short: Sergeant impersonates fallen superior. War comedy that should have been better.

results.headline: Voice in the Mirror
results.summary_short: Quietly interesting tale of alcoholism. Fine co-stars but Walter Matthau, Arthur O'Connell even better.

results.headline: Naked and the Dead, The
